verses.verse: In the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4467>reign<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> –
<S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to me – <S%H6213>"Make<s%> for yourself <S%H4147>bonds<s%> and <S%H4133>yokes<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on your <S%H6677>neck,<s%>

and <S%H7971>send<s%> word to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon<s%> by the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> who <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

"And <S%H6680>command<s%> them [to go] to their <S%H113>masters,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to your <S%H113>masters,<s%>

"I have <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H120>men<s%> and the <S%H929>beasts<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> by My <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and by My <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the one <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H3474>pleasing<s%> in My <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H776>lands<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and I have <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H9130>wild<s%> <S%H9130>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him.

"And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, and his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and his <S%H1121>grandson,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> of his own <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>comes;<s%> then <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> will <S%H5647>make<s%> him their <S%H5647>servant.<s%>

"And it will be, [that] the <S%H1471>nation<s%> or the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> will not <S%H5414>put<s%> its <S%H6677>neck<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> that <S%H1471>nation<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> with <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and with <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H5704>"until<s%> I have <S%H8552>destroyed<s%> it by his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"But as for you, do not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to your <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> your <S%H7080>diviners,<s%> your <S%H2472>dreamers,<s%> your <S%H6049>soothsayers,<s%> or your <S%H3786>sorcerers,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'You shall not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>'

"For they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> to you, in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H7368>remove<s%> you <S%H7368>far<s%> from your <S%H127>land;<s%> and I will <S%H5080>drive<s%> you out, and you will perish.

"But the <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> its <S%H6677>neck<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, I will let <S%H5117>remain<s%> on its <S%H127>land,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "and they will <S%H5647>till<s%> it and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in it."' "

And I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> like <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H935>"Bring<s%> your <S%H6677>necks<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him and his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H2421>live!<s%>

<S%H4100>"Why<s%> will you <S%H4191>die,<s%> you and your <S%H5971>people,<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to that <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>?

"So do not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who <S%H559>speak<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'You shall not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%>' for they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> to you;

for I have not <S%H7971>sent<s%> them," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "but they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> in My <S%H8034>name,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that I may <S%H5080>drive<s%> you out, and that you may perish, you and the <S%H6>prophets<s%> who <S%H5030>prophesy<s%> to you. "

[Then] I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> Do not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the Lord's <S%H1004>house<s%> will <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H4120>shortly<s%> be <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'; for they are <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> to you.

"Do not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to them; <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H2421>live!<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> should <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2723>ruin<s%>?

"But <S%H518>if<s%> they are <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is with them, let them <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H6293>entreat<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> which are <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> may not <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

"For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H4350>stands,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that are <S%H3498>left<s%> in <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%>

<S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> did not <S%H3947>take<s%> when he <S%H1540>carried<s%> into <S%H1540>exile<s%> <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H3588>"Yes,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that are <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%>

'They shall be <S%H935>carried<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and they shall be <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H6485>visit<s%> them,' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> 'Then I will <S%H5927>bring<s%> them <S%H5927>back<s%> and <S%H7725>restore<s%> them to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>' "
